page.title: 11TRAFFIC ON THE A38 RIPLEY
page.content: We went to the A38 through farmland. There was a tunnel which went under the A38 for the farmer.We sat on a grassy bank.We went in the time of 1.55 to 2.05.We had 10 minutes.Some of us counted cars,some motorbikes,some lorries.You had to put a line down every time one went past.We saw lots of cars ,lorries and vans.We heard lots of traffic and a bird.I think they did the right thing to build the By-pass,because it keeps the heavy traffic out of town.We counted:- 107 cars 94 lorries 15 vans 2 police cars 10 recovery trucks. I think the A38 is a bother to the countryside,because it pollutes the air.It destroys the scenery.The fields are peaceful and beautiful places,but with a motorway in the middle,they are all noise and bad air.
